price: Kuma ka ambaci Maryamu* a cikin Littãfi, a lõkacin da ta tsallake daga mutãnenta a wani wuri, a gẽfen gabas.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مَرۡيَمَ إِذِ ٱنتَبَذَتۡ مِنۡ أَهۡلِهَا مَكَانٗا شَرۡقِيّٗا
footnotes: * An fãra da ƙissar Maryamu dõmin a nũna sakamakon da aka yi mata da sãmun ɗan kirki sabõda kasancewarta mutumiyar kirki, kuma da nũna cewa Annabi Ĩsa bã ɗan Allah ba ne.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi maryama idhi intabadhat min ahlihā makānan sharqiyyan
